comments:
Description: When click on cascading paremeter in data explorer view, error message pops up.

<Tested in RCP build20051227>

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a data source, select sample database.
2. Add a data set, select all columns from CUSTOMERS table.
3. Add a cascading parameter group, add two parameters valued "state" and "city".
4. Preview in html, set parameter values.
5. Click on the parameter name in the data explorer view.
6. Error message pops up.

The exception throws from eclipse code. That should be a bug of eclipse, we can't fix it.

java.lang.NullPointerException
at org.eclipse.jface.viewers.StructuredSelection.equals(StructuredSelection.java:111)
